english.segment1: Filthy swine you're going down.. plastic swine you're going out with a bang.
english.segment2: I know who's coming and I know where he's been. yeah, he's the one you'd like to meet in the alley and in the street. so come on quickly, I've had it up to here.. yeah, he's the one you'd like to meet in the alley and in the street
english.segment4: he's not the first to come towering down. they're gonna get you and you're gonna get yours. still screaming for mercy. but men with the power shout.
english.segment6: let's bring him down. we'll take this beast to the ground
english.segment7: for you all. to see. the truth.
english.segment8: I know who's coming and I know where he's been. yeah, he's the one you'd like to meet in the alley and in the street. so come on quickly, I've had it up to here.. yeah, he's the one you'd like to meet in the alley and in the street
english.segment9: you want find me in his shoes. he won't stop this, until the crowds tell him he.. can't hold me down!!!
